attributes.action: Stop bonus payments to senior management of banks that have received money from tax payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop payments to senior management of banks that have received money from tax payers. Contractual agreements should not be a argument for this practise, because some of these banks would not now be working unless they received tax payers money. If banks will not stop bonus payments, the amount of bonus payments made by the banks, should then be taken back from these banks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
